original: Sabbe dhammā sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ekāyanamaggo khayagāmī
analyzed: sabbe dhammā sati sati indriyam sati balam sammāsati sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ ekāyana maggo khaya gāmī

original: bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavā asaṁyojaniyā aganthaniyā anoghaniyā ayoganiyā anīvaraṇiyā
analyzed: bodha gāmī apacaya gāmī anāsavā a sayoja niyā a gantha niyā an ogha niyā a yoga niyā a nīvara niyā

original: aparāmaṭṭhā anupādāniyā asaṅkilesikā, sabbe dhammā buddhānussati dhammānussati saṅghānussati
analyzed: aparāmaṭṭhā anupādāniyā asaṅkilesikā sabbe dhammā buddha anussati dhamma anussati saṅgha anussati

original: sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati ānāpānassati maraṇānussati kāyagatāsati upasamānussatīti?
analyzed: sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati ānāpāna ssati maraṇa anussati kāya gata asati upasama anussati iti

original: Cakkhāyatanaṁ sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ekāyanamaggo
analyzed: cakkha āyatanam sati sati indriyam sati balam sammā sati sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ ekāyana maggo

original: khayagāmī bodhagāmī apacayagāmī anāsavaṁ asaṁyojaniyaṁ …pe… asaṅkilesikaṁ, cakkhāyatanaṁ
analyzed: khaya gāmī bodha gāmī apacaya gāmī anāsavam a sayojaniyam pe a saṅkilesika

original: buddhānussati dhammānussati saṅghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati ānāpānassati
analyzed: buddha anussati dhamma anussati saṅgha anussati sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati ānāpāna ssati
maraṇa anussati kāyagata asati upasama anussati iti

original: Anottappaṁ sati satindriyaṁ satibalaṁ sammāsati …pe… kāyagatāsati upasamānussatīti?
analyzed: anottappam sati sati indriyam sati balam sammā sati pe kāyagata asati upasama anussati iti
sati sati paṭṭhānā sā ca satī iti
cakkhu āyatanam sati paṭṭhāna tat ca satī iti
sati sati paṭṭhānā sā ca satī iti
phoṭṭhabba āyatanam rāgaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ pe
anottappam satipaṭṭhāna tat ca satī iti
cakkhu āyatanam sati paṭṭhāna tat ca na sati iti

original: Sati satipaṭṭhānā, sā ca na satīti?
analyzed: sati sati paṭṭhānā sā ca na satī iti
anottappam satipaṭṭhāna tat ca na sati iti

original: Sati satipaṭṭhānā, sā ca na satīti?
analyzed: sati sati paṭṭhānā sā ca na satī iti

original: Nanu sabbe dhamme ārabbha sati santiṭṭhatīti?
analyzed: nanu sabbe dhamme ārabbha sati santiṭṭhati iti

original: Hañci sabbe dhamme ārabbha sati santiṭṭhatīti, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci sabbe dhamme ārabbha sati santiṭṭhati iti tena vata re vattabbe

original: Sabbaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha sati santiṭṭhatīti sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānāti?
analyzed: sabbam dhammam ārabbha sati santiṭṭhati iti sabbe dhammā sati paṭṭhānā ati

original: Sabbaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha phasso santiṭṭhatīti sabbe dhammā phassapaṭṭhānāti?
analyzed: sabbam dhammam ārabbha phassaḥ santiṭṭhati iti sabbe dhammā phassa paṭṭhānā ati

original: Sabbaṁ dhammaṁ ārabbha sati santiṭṭhatīti sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānāti?
analyzed: sabbam dhammam ārabbha sati santiṭṭhati iti sabbe dhammā sati paṭṭhānā ati
cittam santiṭṭhati iti sabbe dhammā citta paṭṭhānā ti

original: Sabbe sattā upaṭṭhitasatino satiyā samannāgatā satiyā samohitā;
analyzed: sabbe sattāḥ upaṭṭhita satino satiyā samannāgatā satiyā samohitā

original: “amataṁ te, bhikkhave, na paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṁ na paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: amatam te bhikkhave na paribhuñjanti ye kāya gata asatim na paribhuñjanti

original: Amataṁ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti ye kāyagatāsatiṁ paribhuñjantī”ti.
analyzed: amatam te bhikkhave paribhuñjanti ye kāya gata asatim paribhuñjanti iti

original: Sabbe sattā kāyagatāsatiṁ paribhuñjanti paṭilabhanti āsevanti bhāventi bahulīkarontīti?
analyzed: sabbe sattā kāya gata asatim paribhuñjanti paṭilabhanti āsevanti bhāventi bahulīkaronti iti

original: “ekāyano ayaṁ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṁ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṁ samatikkamāya
analyzed: eka ayanaḥ bhikkhave maggo sattānam visuddhiyā soka paridevānam samatikkamāya

original: dukkhadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yadidaṁ
analyzed: dukkha domanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya yat idam

original: “rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: raññaḥ bhikkhave cakkavattissa pātubhāvā sattannam ratanānam pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Cakkaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, hatthiratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, assaratanassa …
analyzed: cakka ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti hatthi ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti assa ratanassa

original: Rañño, bhikkhave, cakkavattissa pātubhāvā imesaṁ sattannaṁ ratanānaṁ pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: raññaḥ bhikkhave cakkavattissa pātubhāvā imesam sattannam ratanānam pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgaratanānaṁ pātubhāvo hoti.
analyzed: tathāgatassa bhikkhave pātubhāvā arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa sattannam bojjhaṅga ratanānam pātubhāvaḥ hoti
sati sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ

original: hoti, vīriyasambojjhaṅgaratanassa pātubhāvo hoti, pītisambojjhaṅgaratanassa pātubhāvo
analyzed: hoti vīriya sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti pīti sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ
hoti passaddhi sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti samādhi sambojjhaṅga ratanassa
pātubhāvaḥ hoti upekkhā sambojjhaṅga ratanassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti

original: Tathāgatassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa imesaṁ sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgaratanānaṁ pātubhāvo hotī”ti.
analyzed: tathāgatassa bhikkhave pātubhāvāḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa imesam sattannam bojjhaṅga ratanānam pātubhāvaḥ hoti iti

original: Tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa sabbe dhammā satisambojjhaṅgaratanāva hontīti?
analyzed: tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa sabbe dhammā sati sambojjhaṅga ratanā va honti iti
